TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lalauran, title = Lalauran, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lalauran} }

S.FORM: = Lalauran = Gaga mniq Taytung Taymarisyang ka alang Lalauran. 60 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 151 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 90% niqan 136 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 10% niqan 15 hiyi koia. Hangan alang alang Ra-raw-ran. Pnseanak Rarawran ga nniq Pay-wan-cu dungus kari na o knmalu bi ka dxgal hini. Nniqan Tay-tung-seyn Tay-ma-ri syang Syang-ran cun. Llbangan Wada sttu hari ka saw 700 knjisan hunac tgaan rulu qrngul Syang-ran. Nniqan llingay breenux. Pgkla ppanan rulu Tey-ru: Peapa rulu qrngul dhuq bcingan tgaan rulu Tay- ma-ri , priyux peapa Ting-tung qe-yun uxay uri o peapa haya dhuq alang Syang-ran. Mgriq rulu: Muda Nan-huwey kung-ru( Tay 9 seyn) dhuq Syang-ran- cun. Mlutuc Teyn-c ti-tu Teyn-c ti-tu alang. Klgan seejiq alang Pay-wan-cu. Skari kari kari Amis, kari Pay-wan, kari Tlu. Snhiyan Cung-cyaw Snhiyan seuxal klgan, Ci-tu-cyaw, Teyn-cwu-cyaw, Ceng-Yey-su-cyaw. Pnyahan alang Hangan Syang-ran sbiyaw kika nalan Tanah. Tunux siida, plalay hangan no "How-cay-ran-se", Amis Ralawdan, dungus na o"kmusa rmingaw nniqan". Ga klwaan Tanah Tunux siida, pneiyah Sin-cu, Myaw-ri thjil qnpah hini ka Khilang, iyux mluk dxgal pskari seejiq Amis kjiyax ka dhyaan. Hngkawas 1930 Tanah Tunux Ceng-fu iyux iya kmdudul knparu ka qnaqih na, wada pesthjil hunacbgurah Syang-ran ka seejiq Amia, seejiq Khilang mseupu mniq sbiyaw nniqan , kiya ka sbiyaw Syang-ran ksun. Amis thangan dxgal nii o Sasadakkan, kika nniqan smriyu qsiya"uri. Iyux smpuwan gaya Amis, Pay-wan-cu, Pey-nan kingal bgurah alang. Seejiq Pay-wan-cu plalay pusu mniq dgiyaq Sang- ran, Tanah Tunux siida iyux kmalu qmlahang, wada tnhjilan breenux ka seejiq Pay-wan cu, seejiq Lalaulan endaan empitu pxal thjil kika mniq alang Sin-syang-ran ka sayang ni ga kndadax alang Cyo- syang-ran lwaqan ka Amis gmaxan mniq hini. Yaa bi wada brah hngkawas 20 ungac bi seejiq mkla hini niqan kingal alang Pay-wan-cu →alang Lalaulan. Siida o seejiq Pay-wan-cu ga ska Amis smiyan mlukus lukus Amis, meuyas uyas Amis, mgrig grig Amis…bitaq niqan kingal jiyax, Seejiq Pay-wan siida gaga wada kska smiyan iyax na Amis , mlukus lukus Amis, meuyas uyas Amis, Pay-wan-cu rrisaw tduwa brahi miying gaya dha nanaq da, kari dha nanaq, alang dha nanaq. Sayang do nasi niqan seejiq ga rmngaw eptsamac sapah pyasan, Pay-wan-cu cin-nyen-hwey siida, plalay lmnglung alang Lalaulan kana han.Alang nii gisu giman da Gisu yahun giman ka alang nii da, alang Lalaulan sayang ga ida ini pstuq mquri pnyahan mdrumuc na. Pgkla rgrigan kwan-kwang Pusu yahan rmigaw: Cin-nyen-hwey, Tay-ma-ri cin- ceng- san, Sin-syang-ran yi-ce, alang qnpahan masu. Pusu sqyanan dxgal. Sin-syang-ran Ci-tu cang-raw cyaw-hwey.Tay-tung-syeyn Tay-ma-ri-syang sin-syang – ran ru 13 rin 88-4 spgan. (Paah pnrhulan Dempsnhyian nuda hngkawas maspac mseupu sngkkingal lnglungan na snalu saw pnrhulan qtaan ka Pay-wan-cu.) Quri rmngaw sjiqan:Sin-syang-ran Cyaw-hwey emptabug Day-min- syung 089-780032 Teyn-c sing-syang Lutuc qnawal: 089-780848 Qtaan bnatas "Tay-tung-syeyn s"- Pnatas Amis Si-tung lmuan hangan dxgal.

= Lalaoran = Gaga mniq Taytong Taymarisyang ka alang Lalaoran. 60 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 151 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 90% niqan 136 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 10% niqan 15 hiyi koia. Hangan alang alang Ra-raw-ran. Pnseanak Rarawran ga nniq Pay-wan-co dongos kari na o knmalo bi ka dxgal hini. Nniqan Tay-tong-seyn Tay-ma-ri syang Syang-ran con. Llbangan Wada stto hari ka saw 700 knjisan honac tgaan rolo qrngol Syang-ran. Nniqan llingay breenox. Pgkla ppanan rolo Tey-ro: Peapa rolo qrngol dhoq bcingan tgaan rolo Tay- ma-ri , priyox peapa Ting-tong qe-yon oxay ori o peapa haya dhoq alang Syang-ran. Mgriq rolo: Moda Nan-howey kong-ro( Tay 9 seyn) dhoq Syang-ran- con. Mlotoc Teyn-c ti-to Teyn-c ti-to alang. Klgan seejiq alang Pay-wan-co. Skari kari kari Amis, kari Pay-wan, kari Tlo. Snhiyan Cong-cyaw Snhiyan seoxal klgan, Ci-to-cyaw, Teyn-cwo-cyaw, Ceng-Yey-so-cyaw. Pnyahan alang Hangan Syang-ran sbiyaw kika nalan Tanah. Tonox siida, plalay hangan no "How-cay-ran-se", Amis Ralawdan, dongos na o"kmosa rmingaw nniqan". Ga klwaan Tanah Tonox siida, pneiyah Sin-co, Myaw-ri thjil qnpah hini ka Khilang, iyox mlok dxgal pskari seejiq Amis kjiyax ka dhyaan. Hngkawas 1930 Tanah Tonox Ceng-fo iyox iya kmdodol knparo ka qnaqih na, wada pesthjil honacbgorah Syang-ran ka seejiq Amia, seejiq Khilang mseopo mniq sbiyaw nniqan , kiya ka sbiyaw Syang-ran kson. Amis thangan dxgal nii o Sasadakkan, kika nniqan smriyo qsiya"ori. Iyox smpowan gaya Amis, Pay-wan-co, Pey-nan kingal bgorah alang. Seejiq Pay-wan-co plalay poso mniq dgiyaq Sang- ran, Tanah Tonox siida iyox kmalo qmlahang, wada tnhjilan breenox ka seejiq Pay-wan co, seejiq Lalaolan endaan empito pxal thjil kika mniq alang Sin-syang-ran ka sayang ni ga kndadax alang Cyo- syang-ran lwaqan ka Amis gmaxan mniq hini. Yaa bi wada brah hngkawas 20 ongac bi seejiq mkla hini niqan kingal alang Pay-wan-co →alang Lalaolan. Siida o seejiq Pay-wan-co ga ska Amis smiyan mlokos lokos Amis, meoyas oyas Amis, mgrig grig Amis…bitaq niqan kingal jiyax, Seejiq Pay-wan siida gaga wada kska smiyan iyax na Amis , mlokos lokos Amis, meoyas oyas Amis, Pay-wan-co rrisaw tdowa brahi miying gaya dha nanaq da, kari dha nanaq, alang dha nanaq. Sayang do nasi niqan seejiq ga rmngaw eptsamac sapah pyasan, Pay-wan-co cin-nyen-hwey siida, plalay lmnglong alang Lalaolan kana han.Alang nii giso giman da Giso yahon giman ka alang nii da, alang Lalaolan sayang ga ida ini pstoq mqori pnyahan mdromoc na. Pgkla rgrigan kwan-kwang Poso yahan rmigaw: Cin-nyen-hwey, Tay-ma-ri cin- ceng- san, Sin-syang-ran yi-ce, alang qnpahan maso. Poso sqyanan dxgal. Sin-syang-ran Ci-to cang-raw cyaw-hwey.Tay-tong-syeyn Tay-ma-ri-syang sin-syang – ran ro 13 rin 88-4 spgan. (Paah pnrholan Dempsnhyian noda hngkawas maspac mseopo sngkkingal lnglongan na snalo saw pnrholan qtaan ka Pay-wan-co.) Qori rmngaw sjiqan:Sin-syang-ran Cyaw-hwey emptabog Day-min- syong 089-780032 Teyn-c sing-syang Lotoc qnawal: 089-780848 Qtaan bnatas "Tay-tong-syeyn s"- Pnatas Amis Si-tong lmoan hangan dxgal.
